name: Chosen of Etherym
text:
2 Sea Serpent monsters including 1 "Etherym" monster
Must first be Fusion Summoned. If this card is Special Summoned, you can discard 1 card; then target 1 Sea Serpent in your GY and 1 card your opponent controls: banish them. If this card leaves the field by battle or opponent's card effect: You can target 2 "Etherym" monsters, with a level, in your GY or banishment; Special Summon 1 "Etherym" Xyz monster from your Extra Deck, then attach the targeted monsters to it (this is treated as an Xyz Summon). You can only use each effect of "Chosen of Etherym" once per turn.
